/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -fopenmp  -I/usr/include -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu -L/usr/local/lib -lserial  -lpthread -g   CMakeFiles/pp2d.dir/pp2d.cpp.o CMakeFiles/pp2d.dir/gfx.cpp.o  -o pp2d -rdynamic -lglib-2.0 -lgobject-2.0 -latk-1.0 -lgio-2.0 -lgthread-2.0 -lgmodule-2.0 -lgdk_pixbuf-2.0 -lcairo -lpango-1.0 -lpangocairo-1.0 -lpangoft2-1.0 -lpangoxft-1.0 -lgdk-x11-2.0 -lgtk-x11-2.0
